title: Task Portability
description: Now you can move tasks between different projects and workspaces directly from the task detail page.

title: Documentation & Updates Center
description: Added a new documentation folder and a dynamic updates section on the login page to keep users informed about the latest changes.

title: Invitation Logic Fixes
description: Resolved issues with workspace invitations and implemented real-time notifications.

title: GCP Project Integration
description: Improved connectivity with GCP projects for smoother development workflows.
